name: Indigo
description: We are a software development boutique, focused on offering software-based solutions that comprehensively (quality, time, investment) meet the expectations and needs of our customers. We have 4 business lines: custom software development management (analysis, design, coding, testing, implementation and maintenance) of software projects, development of apps, mobiles (Android or iOS), staffing of IT staff, product development billing portal for the issuance and reception.
